name: Depth Traveler
description:
Live an adventure under the sea!

You are the captain of your own submarine, and with the desire to explore the depths and limits of the sea, you sail of to the furthest depths the human eye has ever seen.

A game made by:

Victor Garcinuño - Programmer

Albert Pizarro - Programmer

Special thanks to:

Pedro Marín

Eduard Arnau

Carlos Coronado
